title: Rete 4
text:
Rete 4 (in English Network 4) is a <a href="conservative">conservative</a> <a href="Italy">Italian</a> <a href="free-to-air">free-to-air</a> <a href="television%20channel">television channel</a> owned by <a href="Mediaset">Mediaset</a>. Presently the director is <a href="Sebastiano%20Lombardi">Sebastiano Lombardi</a>.
Programs.
TV Programmes (currently).
Rete 4's strength is information: a lot of programs are of this genre.
Telenovelas.
The programming is completed with various genres of films.
Audience.
Share 24h* Rete 4.
